name: Imagine® Babyz®
description:
Travel the world caring for babies and helping them grow. Build your reputation as a babysitter and open your own dream day care business.
• As a babysitter, you’ll see all your babies grow up in 3D and develop their own personalities.
• Show off your babysitting skills and bond with babies like never before:
o Watch, hug, and even talk to your baby via voice recognition!
o Play peekaboo via facial recognition with the camera.
o Take your baby to the park and watch him or her interact with other babies. You can even meet other babies and players via StreetPass™.
• Travel to different countries to babysit! Choose your destination city, from San Francisco, Shanghai, Rome, Paris, Tokyo, and more!
• Customize your babies, from their looks to their room, and manage your budget to buy baby clothes and accessories.
• Progress through the game and earn a great reputation as a popular babysitter, ultimately allowing you to open your very own day care business!
